ai-ja331:1.1_0: Whatever good things are not found
ai-ja331:1.2_0: at the end of the robe
ai-ja331:1.3_0: Like this, one sleeps in the world.
ai-ja331:1.4_0: like a swan from a fire?
ai-ja331:2.1_0: Can not be a good dead,
ai-ja331:2.4_0: The words are hard to admonish,
ai-ja331:3.1_0: Therefore at the time, at the wrong time,
ai-ja331:3.2_0: The astute should protect these words,
ai-ja331:3.3_0: an astute person would not speak overly long
ai-ja331:3.4_0: let them fulfill their own good self,
ai-ja331:4.1_0: But when you’re afraid of wrongdoing,
